system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}

Benefit

Reloading any handgun or machine pistol with a magazine or speedloader costs 2 Combat Points. Reloading any handgun from loose rounds or refilling a magazine or speedloader costs 1 Combat Points per round loaded

Advanced Arms

Reloading a coolant pack into a plasma, laser or electric pistol costs 2 CP.
system.summary: 2 CP to reload handgun mags or speedloaders, 1 CP for loose rounds
